tr.td: Body submitted for autopsy / carcass submitted
Product; Brush or brushing (these may be 2 separate entries as in a physical brush or a portion thereof vs the substance obtained after a surface has been brushed)
Uterine specimen obtained by curettage = Currettings
Fluid used for dialysis - is a product
Environment; (Substance is Known but not in code Table)
Arterial blood collected via arterial line
Venous blood collected via venous line
for forensic and possibly chemistry testing
